entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: ToOrderedDictionary #110286
    Future
  • System.Formats.Nrbf.Tests timeouts #110285
  • ImmutableHashSet properties allows collection initializer usage without error but initializer has no effect #110279
  • build release/9.0 android and ios local failed #110278

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: CollectionMarshal.AsArraySegment<T>(List<T>) overload #110275
  • System.Text.Json 9.0 error #110283
  • Double serialization in net481 accuracy problems #110276
  • CreateDelegate is failing for value/struct types after upgrade to 9.0 #110280
  • The name passed to `DbProviderFactories.GetFactory` is case sensitive but the error message indicates the name is "invariant" which isn't correct #110236

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable AltJits build for LoongArch64 and RiscV64 #110282
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Include correct `HResult` in `IOException` during preallocation when the disk is full #110281
    area-System.IO, community-contribution

Merged

  • Allow optimizing mask conversions on x64 as well #110195
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update unhandled exception handler API to match approved shape. #110254
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Only define _XOPEN_SOURCE in configurecompiler.cmake (for consistency) #110092
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • JIT: enable removal of try/catch if the try can't throw. #110273
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rename {CLR,DOTNET}_ICU/OPENSSL_VERSION_OVERRIDE #110259
    area-System.Globalization, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #110211
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Move arithmetic helpers to managed code #109087
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Non-PGO calli/delegate call transformation #109679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add pMethod param to getHelperFtn EE-JIT API #110267
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT_CountProfile: Avoid BSR instruction for low counts #110258
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RuntimeAsync] Make Async marker a bit in MethodImpl flags #110274
    area-Meta
  • Remove usage of HP libunwind on Apple platforms #110023
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for MacCatalyst/iOS simulator #109928
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-maccatalyst, community-contribution
  • Optimize JTRUE(cast_helper EQ/NE null) expansion #110272
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for emitting Source Link data #110270
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Check if lock is orphaned in GetThreadOwningMonitorLock #107168
    area-VM-coreclr

Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] WASM debugging #2408

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Template engine tests hitting known parallelism issue in GetVisualStudioInstances #44878
  • error MSB3231: Unable to remove directory #42963
  • Track signature errors #42870
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • `dotnet format` raises native AOT warnings regardless of `<EnableConfigurationBindingGenerator/>` #45054
  • Correctly configuring .NET SDK(s) in a Linux environment #45029

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Area - Edit and Continue - 3 #76193
  • Area - Edit and Continue - 2 #76192
  • Area - IDE - 3 #76191
  • Area - IDE - 2 #76190
  • Area - IDE - 1 #76189
  • Area - IDE #76188
  • Fake positive CS8619 when using Linq #76180
  • Area - Value Tracking #76171
  • 'RegisterSymbolAction' for 'Property' doesn't run at all on partial properties with attributes on both definition and implementation parts #76166

Closed

  • Visual Studio adds second quotation mark in unappropriate situations #59427 [Still not fixed] #76138
  • Area - Rename #76016
    Backlog
  • Area - MSBuildWorkspace #75899
    Backlog
  • Area - Completion #76055
    Backlog
  • Area - Editor Config UI #75925
    Backlog
  • Area - Formatting #75785
    Backlog
  • IDE0301 code fixer in ternary expression produces invalid C# code (CS0029) #76085
  • Is it possible to add quick fix for CS1593 ? #75926
    Backlog
  • Contextual Intellisense / Autocomplete Settings Grid #75692
    17.13
  • Possibly infinite loop in DecompilationMetadataAsSourceFileProvider.GetGeneratedFileAsync #63178
    17.13
  • Reference highlighting doesn't work from primary constructor base call constructor call #74804
    17.13
  • `CSharpMergeConsecutiveIfStatementsCodeRefactoringProvider` encountered an error and has been disabled #74773
    17.13
  • `CSharpWrappingCodeRefactoringProvider` encountered an error and has been disabled #74771
    17.13
  • IDE automatically adds async keyword to methods without changing the return type #55975
    Backlog
  • De-duplicate loc strings across Roslyn #56585
    17.13
  • Intellisense generates incorrect cref in XML docs when method has ValueTuple parameters #66502
    Backlog
  • Getting ghost lightbulbs lately #72310
    17.13
  • IDE0060 false positive with [EnumeratorCancellation] attribute #71719
    18.0
  • Intellisense suggest nuint rather than null #68841
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio no longer displays warning for inappropriate namespace #68239
    Backlog
  • Remove Unused References does not work for .NET Standard 2.0 project although it uses the new csproj format #68189
    18.0
  • `SyntaxGenerator.Declaration` missing interface modifiers #66387
    Backlog
  • csharp_style_var_when_type_is_apparent breaks when awaiting a generic type #64902
    Backlog
  • Moving a type nested in a record to its own file creates a duplicate primary constructor declaration in the new partial record declaration #62713
    Backlog
  • IDE0200 "Lambda expression can be removed" codefix can delete code comments #60741
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Have go-to-def flip between partial definition and implementation #76187
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Keep member bodies when converting DIM property to method #76186
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Improve parsing recovery with 'file' keyword #76185
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do not duplicate directives when converting from property to methods #76184
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Disable 'use pattern matching' when eliding multiple calls that pass by ref #76183
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Catch expected exception when reading info out of a PDB #76182
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support nint/intptr conversion on c# 11 and up #76181
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do not pass primary constructor parameters explicit when extracting methods #76179
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support implementing protected members in implement interface #76178
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update suggestion mode provider to support params collections #76177
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Filter out certain compiler attributes when extracting an interface #76176
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix wrapping issues in simplify conditional #76175
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update type inference in a primary constructor base type #76174
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Disable 'use coalesce expression' when statements cross a PP boundary #76173
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Keep cast that prevents the compiler from warning about an unintentional implicit object cast. #76172
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support name completion on generic types #76170
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Improve extract-local-function in the presence of pp directives #76169
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Don't place 'async' after 'partial' modifier #76168
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix info for implicit objects in find-references #76167
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Properly update return type when updating method. #76157
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Delete dupe loc strings #76159
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Restrict some types in object initializer setters when not directly settable #75507
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix primary ctor param in static context #74580
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add spec for the data section string literals feature flag #76139
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Fix switch indentation for list patterns #75953
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Format labeled statements when colon is typed #76142
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • LocalView goes out of sync and throws an IndexOutOfRangeException #35243
    Backlog

Closed

  • Query/Perf: Compile identifier lambdas passed to PopulateIncludeCollection rather than inline #35212
    9.0.1
  • Query/Perf: don't compile liftable constant resolvers in interpretation mode when the resolver itself contains a lambda #35208
    9.0.1
  • Query/Perf: don't use Invoke in value comparer ObjectEqualsExpression lambdas #35206
    9.0.1
  • Allow Json property to be updated by using ExecuteUpdate or as a single property #35240
  • After upgrading to .Net 9 with EF 9 the global query filter code throws a runtime exception #35111

PullRequests

Merged

  • Handle comparers for nullable value types in primitive collections #35235
  • Fix query filters with context accessors #35237

Updated

  • [release/9.0] Avoid using `^` and `~` when invalid because of value converters #35241
    Servicing-consider
  • Temporary fix for DropTable/CreateTable issue around temporal tables #35225
